name: STOP
notes:
Exits the current context successfully.

When a call is executed on an address with no code and the EVM tries to read the code data, the default value is returned, 0, which corresponds to the this instruction and halts the execution.

name: ADD

output.a + b: integer result of the addition modulo 2^256.

errors:
The state changes done by the current context are reverted in the following cases:

Not enough gas.
Not enough values on the stack.

name: MUL

output.a * b: integer result of the multiplication modulo 2^256.

errors:
The state changes done by the current context are reverted int he following cases:

Not enough gas.
Not enough values on the stack.

name: SUB

input.b: integer value to subtract from the first.

output.a - b: integer result of the subtraction modulo 2^256

errors:
The state changes done by the current context are reverted in the following cases:

Not enough gas.
Not enough values on the stack.
